Delete Misc/BlessOverride settings.name: Delete Misc/BlessOverride settings
Delete Misc/BlessOverride settings.description: Add custom scanning paths through the bless model

values.name: Empty list
values.description: No custom scanning paths through the bless model

Reset Misc Boot settings.name: Reset Misc Boot settings
Reset Misc Boot settings.description: Sets Misc/Boot/LauncherOption to Disabled to avoid registering the launcher option in the firmware preferences for persistence

values.name: Disabled
values.description: Do not register the launcher option in the firmware preferences for persistence

values.name: Full
values.description: Create or update the top priority boot option in UEFI variable storage at bootloader startup

values.name: Short
values.description: Create a short boot option instead of a complete one. Useful for Insyde H2O BIOS that are unable to manage full device paths

values.name: System
values.description: Create no boot option but assume specified custom option is blessed. Useful when relying on ForceBooterSignature quirk
Enable basic logging without writing to file
Enable file logging by writing to opencore-YYYY-MM-DD-HHMMSS.txt

Delete Misc/Entries settings.name: Delete Misc/Entries settings
Delete Misc/Entries settings.description: Deletes custom bootloader entries from config.plist

Delete Misc/Security settings.name: Delete Misc/Security settings
Delete Misc/Security settings.description: Various security settings to fix from config.plist

values.description: Do not use Apple Enclave Identifier
Use default OpenCore scanning rules (APFS, SATA, NVMe mainly)

values.name: Disabled
values.description: No model, Secure Boot will be disabled

values.name: Default
values.description: Matching model for current SMBIOS

values.name: Optional
values.description: No vault is enforced, insecure

values.name: Basic
values.description: Require vault.plist file present in OC directory. This provides basic filesystem integrity verification and may protect from unintentional filesystem corruption

values.name: Secure
values.description: Require vault.sig signature file for vault.plist in OC directory. This includes Basic integrity checking but also attempts to build a trusted bootchain.

values.name: Generic MLB
values.description: Use a generic MLB for sharing purposes

values.name: Generic ROM
values.description: Use a generic ROM for sharing purposes

values.name: Generic SystemSerialNumber
values.description: Use a generic SystemSerialNumber for sharing purposes

values.name: Generic SystemUUID
values.description: Use a generic SystemUUID for sharing purposes

Change APFS settings.name: Change APFS settings
Change APFS settings.description: Sets minimal allowed APFS driver date and version to permit any release date and version to load

values.name: MinDate
values.description: Minimal allowed APFS driver date

values.name: MinDate
values.description: Minimal allowed APFS driver version

Disable Resizable BAR Support.name: Disable Resizable BAR Support
Disable Resizable BAR Support.description: Sets two quirks in config.plist to disable Resizable BAR support if it" disabled in system firmware settings

values.name: ResizeAppleGpuBars
values.description: Disable ResizeAppleGpuBars quirk

values.name: ResizeGpuBars
values.description: Disable custom GPU PCI BAR custom sizes
